description.narrative: By 2017, national and provincial legislatures and administrative authorities have improved capacity to draft, reform and implement legislation that complies with international child rights standards and to undertake priority advocacy actions for child rights, which contributes to Human Rights Institutions, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017, national policies, legislation, plans, budgets, coordination and monitoring mechanisms are enabling the survival, development, protection and participation rights of children, adolescents, and women, to be fulfilled with equity in all contexts, including humanitarian situations

title.narrative: Nepal United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Nepal 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, national and provincial legislatures and administrative authorities have improved capacity to draft, reform and implement legislation that complies with international child rights standards and to undertake priority advocacy actions for child rights

description.narrative: There is no progress on the CRC since the mid year report. | Status:No Progress | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: # Parliamentarians actively engaged in discussing child rights issues in Parliament

actual.value: 2017:Parliamentarians engaged in discussion on the concluding observations from the Committee on the Rights of the Child on Third to Fifth Periodic Report of Nepal on the Convention on the Rights of the Child and its optional protocols.

title.narrative: # of laws reformed, promulgated in line with CRC

baseline.value: 23 of 46 child rights relevant acts contravene child rights standards

target.value: 2017:Revised Comprehensive Child Rights Act promulgated and 5 other revised child rights laws

actual.value: 2017:The current gaps and structural barriers in birth registration were reviewed; and the reforms required have been identified through the joint work of United Nations Working Group on Citizenship.

title.narrative: Child Rights Commissioner appointed as part of National Human Rights Commission and other human rights mechanisms implement recommendations from Committee on the Rights of the Child

baseline.value: No Commissioner and partial implementation of CRC recommendations

target.value: 2017:Commissioner appointed and full implementation of CRC recommendations
